content.p: Department of Mechanical, Materials and Manufacturing Engineering Follow us on LinkedIn This is the place solving real-world challenges. We develop exceptional mechanical and manufacturing engineers who improve people’s lives and help make a greener planet spin a little smoother. Here you get the space, support, skills and connections to revel in the real world. Immerse yourself in cutting-edge tools and technologies, learning core skills in mechatronics, thermodynamics, fluid mechanics, engineering design, materials, manufacturing and more. From career-advancing courses to our world-leading research, our mechanical and manufacturing engineers are highly sought after in industry. Get ready to shape the real world. Explore Mechanical and Manufacturing Engineering facilities Learn about pioneering research for a sustainable future Where are Mechanical and Manufacturing Engineering graduates now? View contact details, expertise and publications Read about our electric car racing team "The engineering development that goes on behind closed doors with Formula 1 is absolutely fascinating. As an engineer, you’re always looking at new technologies and finding ways to adapt things that already seem to be at their most optimum state into something better." — James Key, Mechanical Engineering MEng graduate (Technical Director at Alfa Romeo Formula 1 Team)
